mapper.select: SELECT * from kms_register as re INNER JOIN kms_student_record as st on re.student_id = st.id INNER JOIN kms_class as cla on re.classroom_id = cla.id INNER JOIN kms_classmodel as clm on re.classModel_id = clm.id where classModel_id=#{classModelId}
select count(*) from kms_register where student_id=#{student_id}
mapper.sql: id, student_id, classroom_id, start_date, end_date, Paidin, expla_in
mapper.insert:
insert into kms_register
student_id,
classroom_id,
start_date,
classModel_id,
end_date,
class_hour,
Paidin,
expla_in,
#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{classroomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{classModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{classHour,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{paidin,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{explaIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update kms_register
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
classroom_id = #{classroomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
class_hour = #{classHour,jdbcType=LONG},
Paidin = #{paidin,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
expla_in = #{explaIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update kms_register set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, classroom_id = #{classroomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Paidin = #{paidin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, expla_in = #{explaIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
